comments.body: Let's open a ticket about keeping Scalameta version in sync with guide.md.
This diff is unrelated to the scalameta version, I think it's exceptional enough that the cache location changed to not have to keep a not around here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +439,443 @@    [directories-jvm](https://github.com/soc/directories-jvm).
    For example, on macOS the location for scala-library would be
    `$HOME/Library/Caches/org.scalameta.SemanticDB/3.7.4/scala-library-FINGERPRINT.jar`.
  * Class directories. Never cached to avoid overflowing the cache with
    transient results.
